description:
OpenAddressLottery.participate() (shared/other/open_address_lottery/open_address_lottery_3round.sol#23-41) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- luckyNumberOfAddress(msg.sender) == LuckyNumber (shared/other/open_address_lottery/open_address_lottery_3round.sol#29)
OpenAddressLottery.forceReseed().s (shared/other/open_address_lottery/open_address_lottery_3round.sol#69) is a local variable never initialized
